5457.description: This man looks like a cleric/warrior, I wouldn't mess with him.

5458.name: warrior
5458.long_desc: The Guard for the Guild of Warriors stands here.
5458.description: The man looks like Conan's cousin, I wouldn't mess with him.

5459.name: thief
5459.long_desc: The Guard for the Guild of theives stands here.
5459.description:
You see a thief dressed all in black, he quickly stands as you
enter and steps to bar your way.  You notice his hands resting
on two sheathes.

5460.name: servant
5460.long_desc: A servant boy is here running errands.
5460.description: You see a small boy running around the halls of the palace.

5461.name: sultans
5461.long_desc: A guard stands here, protecting the innocent.
5461.description: You see a trained fighter, ready to help those in need.

5462.name: sultans
5462.long_desc: A guard stands here, watching the gate.
5462.description: You see a trained fighter, ready to defend the city.

5463.name: sultans
5463.long_desc: The Chief of the Sultan's Guard stands here.
5463.description: You see a large man skilled in hunting and killing.

5464.name: mercenary
5464.long_desc: A mercenary stands here waiting for a job.
5464.description: You see an assassin down on his luck looking to be freelanced out.

5465.name: shipwright
5465.long_desc: An old captain rests here carving on a stick.
5465.description:
You see the shipwright of New Thalos, waiting to make someone a boat.  He
beams a smile at you through his beard as you walk in.

5466.name: blacksmith
5466.long_desc: The blacksmith stands here pumping air into his fire.
5466.description:
You see a large human, dripping in sweat, standing before you.  He takes
a break from his swealtering work to bid you welcome.

5467.name: horse
5467.description: You see one of the fine Arabian beasts known about the land.

5468.name: tourist
5468.long_desc: A tourist stands here looking lost.
5468.description:
You see a small, rotund man, with a strange object around his neck and
a nose guard.  He is looking at a small map that he seems to be holding
upside down.

5469.name: ixitxachitl
5469.long_desc: A very large ray with a wicked looking tail swims here.
5469.description: You see a large ray with sharp fangs and a barbed tail.

5470.name: cryohydra
5470.description: A grey-brown reptillian creature with amber eyes stands before you.

5471.name: minotaur
5471.description: A huge lizard like reptile with horns like a minotaur.

5472.name: dog
5472.description: A large two-headed hound barks at you vicously.

5473.name: lion
5473.description: A large fierce dapple skinned lion glares at you.

5474.name: behir
5474.long_desc: A behir slithers on the ground.
5474.description: You see a large snake-like reptile with more than a dozen legs.

5475.name: chimera
5475.long_desc: A creature with three heads: lion, goat, and dragon stands here.
5475.description:
The chimera is still a mystery, better left unexplored.  This creature
has the hindquarters of a goat, the forepaws of a lion and the body of
a red dragon.

5476.name: couatl
5476.description:
A beautiful creature with the body of a serpent and feathered wings the
colour of the rainbow.

5477.name: giant
5477.description: It is a hornet, what else can be said?

5478.name: pegasus
5478.long_desc: The pegasus stands here, flexing its wings.
5478.description:
A magnificant winged steed, this horse looks much like the Arabian
thoroughbreds you have seen in stables.

5479.name: elriva
5479.long_desc: Elriva stands here mixing a love potion.
5479.description:
You see a very healthy female dressed in black, with long flowing
hair to match her outfit.

5480.name: braheem
5480.long_desc: Braheem stands here talking to the walls.
5480.description: You see a powerful but slighty insane mage.

5481.name: high
5481.long_desc: The high priest rests here meditating, well he WAS meditating.
5481.description: He does NOT look real happy that you have disturbed him.

5482.name: royal
5482.long_desc: An Elite Royal Guard stands here smiling happily.
5482.description:
You see one of the Royal Guards of New Thalos who seems to have undergone
some heavy training.

5483.name: patch
5483.long_desc: A large half-orc with a patch over one eye pours beer behind the counter.
5483.description:
You see a really big guy here who seems to have lost an eye in one manner
or another.

5484.name: stitch
5484.long_desc: Stitch, the leather dude reclines in his chair.
5484.description:
You see a small hobbit with his feet kicked up on his desk waiting for
some sucker, uhm, customer to walk in his store.

5485.name: gardener
5485.long_desc: A small elf stands here tending the garden.
5485.description:
A young elf stands here in dirt covered overalls.  He seems to be
weeding his garden.

5486.name: nightmare
5486.long_desc: A large horse, black as night, stands here.
5486.description:
You see the largest horse you have ever seen before.  Standing 10'
at the shoulder it breathes flame from his nostrils and leaps to
attack you.

5487.name: wolverine
5487.long_desc: A large wolf like creature leaps out from the darkness.
5487.description:
You see a half wolf, half human beast wearing a glove with long thin
blades on it.

5488.name: mimic
5488.long_desc: You see an incredibly life-like painting of the Sultan's mother.

5489.name: mayor
5489.long_desc: The Mayor of New Thalos stands here.
5489.description: You see a chubby rabbit dressed in his best suit.

5490.name: chef
5490.long_desc: The chef stands here making dinner.
5490.description: You see a very large human who seems to taste everything he makes.

5400.name: palace
5400.short_desc: the palace key of New Thalos
5400.room_desc: A large key bearing the crest of New Thalos lies here.

5401.name: city
5401.short_desc: the Key to the City of New Thalos
5401.room_desc: The heavy city key lies here in the dust

5402.name: fountain
5402.room_desc: The large central fountain domintating the central square rests here.

5403.name: morningstar
5403.room_desc: A small spiked metal ball connected to a rod by links of chain lies here.

5406.name: corbin
5406.room_desc: A bec de corbin lies here.

5412.name: sword
5412.room_desc: A two handed bastard sword lies here.

5415.name: suit
5415.room_desc: A suit of banded mail lies here.

5417.name: suit
5417.room_desc: A suit of field plate lies here.

5418.name: suit
5418.room_desc: A suit of ringmail lies here.

5419.name: suit
5419.room_desc: A suit of splintmail aromr lies here.

5424.name: sleeves
5424.room_desc: A pair of leather sleeves lies here.

5426.name: pants
5426.room_desc: A pair of leather pants lies here.

5427.name: gloves
5427.room_desc: A pair of leather gloves lies here.

5428.name: boots
5428.short_desc: a pair of padded leather boots
5428.room_desc: A pair of padded leather boots lies here.

5429.name: jacket
5429.room_desc: A studded leather jacket lies here.

5430.name: sleeves
5430.short_desc: a pair of studded leather sleeves
5430.room_desc: A pair of studded leather sleeves lie here.

5431.name: pants
5431.short_desc: a pair of studded leather pants
5431.room_desc: A pair of studded leather pants lie here.

5432.name: gloves
5432.short_desc: a pair of studded leather gloves
5432.room_desc: A pair of studded leather gloves lie here.

5440.name: cheese
5440.room_desc: A hunk of cheese lies here.

5443.name: rations
5443.room_desc: A tin of iron rations lies here.

5445.name: nuts
5445.room_desc: Some nuts lie scatterd on the ground.

5446.name: belt
5446.room_desc: A nicely made belt lies here.

5447.name: boots
5447.room_desc: A nicely made pair of boots lies here.

5448.name: cloak
5448.room_desc: A nicely made fur cloak lies here.

5449.name: girdle
5449.room_desc: A nicely made girdle lies here.

5450.name: hose
5450.room_desc: A nicely made pair of hose lies here.

5451.name: robe
5451.room_desc: A nicely made robe of common cloth lies here.

5452.name: robe
5452.room_desc: A nicely made robe of embroidered cloth lies here.

5453.name: sandals
5453.room_desc: A nicely made pair of sandals lies here.

5454.name: sash
5454.room_desc: A nicely made sash lies here.

5455.name: jacket
5455.room_desc: A nicely made silk jacket lies here.

5460.name: dates
5460.room_desc: A bunch of dates lies here.

5461.name: lamb
5461.room_desc: A leg of lamb lies here.

5462.name: beef
5462.room_desc: A side of beef lies here.

5463.name: chicken
5463.room_desc: A whole skinned chicken lies here.

5467.name: glass
5467.room_desc: A glass of blue alcohol rests here.

5470.name: vial
5470.room_desc: A glowing blue vial lies here.

5472.name: potion
5472.room_desc: A crystal clear potion lies here.

5474.name: potion
5474.room_desc: A dark blue potion lies here.

5475.name: bottle
5475.room_desc: A bottle of strong beer lies here.

5476.name: barrel
5476.room_desc: A barrel of beer lies here.

5477.name: shot
5477.room_desc: A shot of strong liquor lies here.

5478.name: scroll
5478.room_desc: A scroll of recall lies here.

5480.name: wand
5480.room_desc: A wand of glinting yellow lies here.

5481.name: wand
5481.room_desc: A wand of oak lies here.

5483.name: shears
5483.room_desc: A pair of sewing shears lies here.

5490.name: chessboard
5490.room_desc: A heavy marble chessboard lies here.

5492.name: spear
5492.room_desc: A beautiful spear is lying on the ground here.

5493.name: key
5493.room_desc: The key to the jail lies here.

5495.name: claw
5495.room_desc: A claw from some animal lies here.

5496.name: wrath
5496.room_desc: A large ornate mace floats above the ground here.
